getEdgeTypeMap

public EdgeTypeMap getEdgeTypeMap()
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Return the singleton EdgeTypeMap. Thie EdgeTypeMap is used for deciding how Nodes added to HyperEdges or Nodes in the construction of a new HyperEdge, will be treated with respect to their role (source or target) within the Edges created.

Specified by:
getEdgeTypeMap in interface HyperEdgeFactory

createHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createHyperEdge(giny.model.Node node1,
                                 java.lang.String edgeIType1,
                                 giny.model.Node node2,
                                 java.lang.String edgeIType2,
                                 giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Create and return a HyperEdge connecting two Nodes. The HyperEdge will contain a newly created ConnectorNode. Two Edges will be created that connect each Node to this Connector Node. The edge interaction types specify the type attribute to associate with each Edge created and whether each node is the source or target of each Edge.

Specified by:
createHyperEdge in interface HyperEdgeFactory
Parameters:
node1 - the first node to add to the HyperEdge.
edgeIType1 - the edge interaction type of node1. edgeIType1 also determines the Role played by node1 within the newly created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
node2 - the second node to add to the HyperEdge.
edgeIType2 - the edge interaction type of node2. edgeIType2 also determines the Role played by node2 within the newly created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
Returns:
the newly created HyperEdge. After the HyperEdge is created, all HyperEdgeManager NewObjectListeners are notified by invoking their NewObjectListener.objectCreated() methods about the creation of this new HyperEdge.
See Also:
HyperEdgeFactory, EdgeTypeMap

createHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createHyperEdge(giny.model.Node node1,
                                 java.lang.String edgeIType1,
                                 giny.model.Node node2,
                                 java.lang.String edgeIType2,
                                 giny.model.Node node3,
                                 java.lang.String edgeIType3,
                                 giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Create and return a HyperEdge connecting three Nodes. The HyperEdge will contain a newly created ConnectorNode. Three Edges will be created that connect each Node to this Connector Node. The edge interaction types specify the type attribute to associate with each Edge created and whether each node is the source or target of each Edge.

Specified by:
createHyperEdge in interface HyperEdgeFactory
Parameters:
node1 - the first node to add to the HyperEdge.
edgeIType1 - the edge interaction type of node1. edgeIType1 also determines the Role played by node1 within the newly created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
node2 - the second node to add to the HyperEdge.
edgeIType2 - the edge interaction type of node2. edgeIType2 also determines the Role played by node2 within the newly created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
node3 - the third node to add to the HyperEdge.
edgeIType3 - the edge interaction type of node3. edgeIType3 also determines the Role played by node3 within the newly created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
Returns:
the newly created HyperEdge. After the HyperEdge is created, all HyperEdgeManager NewObjectListeners are notified by invoking their NewObjectListener.objectCreated() methods about the creation of this new HyperEdge.
See Also:
HyperEdgeFactory, EdgeTypeMap

createHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createHyperEdge(giny.model.Node[] nodes,
                                 java.lang.String[] edgeITypes,
                                 giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Creates a HyperEdge based on a an array of Nodes along with a corresponding array of Roles. The HyperEdge will contain a newly created ConnectorNode. Edges will be created what connect each given Node to this ConnectorNode.

Specified by:
createHyperEdge in interface HyperEdgeFactory
Parameters:
nodes - an Array of Nodes to be members of this HyperEdge.
edgeITypes - an Array of corresponding edge interaction types (one for each Node) used for setting the type attribute of the Edges created and the role played by each node in each created Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
Returns:
the newly created HyperEdge. After the HyperEdge is created, all HyperEdgeManager NewObjectListeners are notified by invoking their NewObjectListener.objectCreated() methods about the creation of this new HyperEdge.
See Also:
HyperEdgeFactory, EdgeTypeMap

createHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createHyperEdge(java.util.List<giny.model.Node> nodes,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> edgeITypes,
                                 giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Creates a HyperEdge based on a List of Nodes along with a corresponding List of Edge interaction types. The HyperEdge will contain a newly created ConnectorNode. For each Node given, an Edge will be created that connects this Node to the ConnectorNode.

Specified by:
createHyperEdge in interface HyperEdgeFactory
Parameters:
nodes - a List of Nodes to be members of this HyperEdge.
edgeITypes - a List of corresponding edge interaction types (one for each Node) used for setting the type attribute of the Edges created and the role played by each node in each create Edge. For details, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.
Returns:
the newly created HyperEdge. After the HyperEdge is created, all HyperEdgeManager NewObjectListeners are notified by invoking their NewObjectListener.objectCreated() methods about the creation of this new HyperEdge.
See Also:
HyperEdgeFactory, EdgeTypeMap

createHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createHyperEdge(java.util.Map<giny.model.Node,java.lang.String> node_edgeIType_map,
                                 giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Description copied from interface: HyperEdgeFactory
Creates a HyperEdge based on a map of a Node key to an Edge interaction type value. Each key and value must be non-null and all values must be a non-empty edge interaction types. The HyperEdge will contain a newly created ConnectorNode. For each edge interaction type value associated with a Node key, an Edge will be created that connects the Node key to the HyperEdge Node. The type attribute of this Edge will be the edge interaction type value and specify whether the node is the source or target of this Edge. For details on how each edge interaction type value determines the corresponding node's role within each new Edge, see the discussion in this class description and the example in EdgeTypeMap.

Specified by:
createHyperEdge in interface HyperEdgeFactory
Returns:
the newly created HyperEdge. After the HyperEdge is created, all HyperEdgeManager NewObjectListeners are notified by invoking their NewObjectListener.objectCreated() methods about the creation of this new HyperEdge.
See Also:
HyperEdgeFactory, EdgeTypeMap

createRestoredHyperEdge

public HyperEdge createRestoredHyperEdge(giny.model.Node connectorNode,
                                         giny.model.GraphPerspective gp)
Used by the restore process for creating objects. Not a user-level operation.
